VLIB Function Reference

Hysteresis Thresholding

Introduction and Use Cases

With an edge map containing possible edges, hysteresis thresholding identifies and follows edges. Using both High and Low thresholds,it is able to maintain edge continuity by linking stronger edge segments that are connected to weaker segments.

Specification

Function

This function is similar to VLIB_doublethresholding, except this function additionally reevaluates the list of edge pixels and links stronger edge segments that are connected to weaker segments.

Inputs


    Parameter          Description
    -------------------------------------------------------------------
    *pInMagBlk         Pointer to array containing magnitude   (SQ15.0)
    *edgeMap           Pointer to array Edge map               (UQ8.0)
    *scratch           Pointer to array strong edge list       (UQ8.0)
     blkHeight         Input height                            (UQ16.0)
     blkWidth          Input width                             (UQ16.0)
     loThresh          Lower threshold                         (UQ8.0)
     hiThreshold       Upper threshold                         (UQ8.0)

APIS
